topics.title: How to get peers
topics.body:
i am running my site off of my rpi but when i try to connect to my site from my desktop, it says "no peers" then it says "content.json download failed" or "could not find index.html" both of which are there.
the site is    1Atifm3m3wqUo7RqD2GPnyG6PKSxCk3g4c

1@181.body:
i forwarded the port 15441 to my rpi but i am still getting "no peers found content.json download failed"
the output from the pi reads "[10:16:23] FileServer [OK :)] Port open: Success: I can see your service on 104.          230.8.230 on port (15441) Your ISP is not blocking port 15441" which should mean the port is open.
@nofish  same result after running siteSign.  There are now 2 peers yet content.json still fails to download.  my content.json isnt missing.  would the local network be messing it up?
yeah i see it.  i had run siteSign before my first post though so i dont think that was it
